data.title: Upcoming Movies In 2024: New Movie Release Dates
data.meta_description: Take a look at our release date schedule for all the upcoming 2024 movies to look forward to.
data.text:
If you thought that our 2023 movie schedule was jam-packed with exciting titles, wait until you see what is coming out in 2024. As usual, you can expect to see plenty of upcoming Marvel movies and a few new DC movies, but also forthcoming horror films are in a scarily high supply.

Of course, there is much, much more than just new superhero movies and terrifying tales to behold on our upcoming 2024 movies schedule. Just take a look below and see for yourself. Also, be sure to check out our upcoming 2025 movie schedule to peer even further into Hollywood's future.

July 2024 Movie Releases

Ryan Reynolds' Merc with a Mouth and Hugh Jackman's Wolverine enter the MCU for the first time in Deadpool & Wolverine in July 2024, which will also see another Despicable Me movie and a Twister "sequel" called Twisters.

August 2024 Movie Releases

A new reimagining of The Crow, another chapter in a landmark sci-fi franchise with Fede Álvarez's Alien: Romulus, and more intriguing releases come out in August 2024.

September 2024 Movie Releases

The long-awaited sequel to Beetlejuice and the Autobots and Decepticions' return to big screen animation with Transformers One occurs in September 2024.

October 2024 Movie Releases

There are going to be a lot of freaky clowns running around during the Halloween season when the musical DC sequel, Joker: Folie á Deux, and Damien Leone's upcoming slasher sequel, Terrifier 3, hit theaters in October 2024.

November 2024 Movie Releases

November 2024 is going to be a Wicked month with Part One of said broadway musical hitting the big screen, as well as a magical month with the upcoming Moana sequel hitting theaters.

December 2024 Movie Releases

A classic Spider-Man villain receives his own origin story in the upcoming Kraven the Hunter movie, Ben Schwartz comes back as the video game icon with Sonic the Hedgehog 3, and Nosferatu is resurrected in Robert Eggers' remake in December 2024.

There are a few upcoming sci-fi movies, a number of upcoming A24 movies, a new adaptation of Stephen King's Salem's Lot coming to Max, and other films we hope to see in 2024. On what day, exactly, still remains a mystery.

January 2024 Movie Releases

Kevin Hart got a Lift into action hero status with his new Netflix original movie and Mean Girls became a cinematic musical, among other exciting titles that came out in January 2024.

February 2024 Movie Releases

Dakota Johnson starred as one of Spider-Man's most unique and wisest allies in her own movie, Madame Web, and Kingsley Ben-Adir became Bob Marley in a new biopic called Bob Marley: One Love, in February 2024

March 2024 Movie Releases

Denis Villeneuve's second half of Dune arrived in March 2024, which also saw another Ghostbusters sequel, the return of formerly rivalrous kaijus in Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire, and much more.

April 2024 Movie Releases

In April 2024, the moments leading up to the birth of greatest evil the world has ever seen was revealed in The First Omen and Alex Garland showed us what the world could become if chaos prevails in his dystopian drama, Civil War.

May 2024 Movie Releases

In May 2024, Chris Pratt voiced the title role of Garfield, Anya Taylor-Joy became a young Furiosa, and more.

June 2024 Movie Releases

Emotions returned to run wild again in Pixar's sequel, Inside Out 2, more from the world of the A Quiet Place movies was revealed in the third installment, A Quiet Place: Day One, and more that came out in June 2024.

2024 Is a big year for the movies.
